Access token received, please continue: 取得憑證成功，請繼續之前的操作
Author: 作者
Please authorize your account, and fill: 登入授權後，您將取得一串代碼，請將代碼填入以下輸入框即可完成綁定
This action will clear and remove this s: 此操作會清空並刪除此書架
This action will clear and remove this t: 此操作會清空並刪除此標籤
Auto open last-read book: 自動打開上次閱讀的圖書
Please import less than 10 books: 請一次導入10本以內的書
Please delete some books before import: 您的書庫太大，請先刪除一些書
For better user experince, please visit: Koodo Reader專為桌面端設計打造，暫未適配移動端，請在電腦上打開本網站
It seems like you're lost: 妳要訪問的內容走丟了
Only desktop support this format: 僅客戶端版本支持 mobi 和 txt 格式
Only desktop support this service: 僅客戶端支持該備份方式
This action will move this book and its: 將圖書以及圖書的書籤，筆記，重點移至回收站
This action won't delete the original bo: 僅從此書架中移除本書，原圖書不受影響
Do you want to open this link in browser: 是否使用瀏覽器打開此鏈接
WebDAV Info: WebDAV是一種簡單高效的數據備份方式，這裡推薦使用堅果雲提供的WebDAV服務
Too many images: 圖書包含過多圖片會嚴重影響解析速度
Audio is not ready yet: 圖書解析中，請稍後再試
This action will remove all the books in: 此操作會徹底刪除回收站中的所有圖書和它們的書簽，筆記和高亮
Batch import only support epub or pdf fi: 批量導入僅支持epub或pdf格式
The deleted books will show up here: 被刪除的圖書會出現在這裏，清空回收站才會徹底刪除
Sync function works with third-party clo: 同步功能需要配合第三方同步盤實現，在不同電腦上把數據存儲位置修改為同一個網盤文件夾，點擊同步按鈕後，Koodo會自動進行數據的雙向同步。目前該功能還處在測試階段，請謹慎使用。
Please turn off open books in the main w: 請關閉直接在主窗口打開圖書
Data change detected, whether to update?: 檢測到數據變化，是否更新
Backup your data with WebDAV: 使用 WebDAV 來備份和恢復數據
Click the import button to add books: 請點擊右上角的導入圖書按鈕加入圖書
Auto Update relies on GitHub Release for: 自動更新功能依賴GitHub，如果您本地網絡無法穩定訪問GitHub，則不建議開啟此功能，開啟之後，將不再單獨提供更新提醒。
Move your mouse on the top of any book,: 將滑鼠游標移動到任意書本上方，點擊愛心圖示將圖書加入到我的最愛
Select any text and click the note butto: 在閱讀器界面，選取文字後，在彈出的對話框中點擊筆記
Select any text and click the highlight: 在閱讀器界面，選取文字後，在彈出的對話框中點擊高亮
Move your mouse on top of any book, then: 將滑鼠游標移動到任意書本上方，在彈出的選單中點擊加到書架
Download failed, network problem or no b: 下载失败，网络问题或没有备份
Upload failed, check your connection: 上傳失敗，請檢查網路連線
Click on any book to read: 點擊任意一本書開始閱讀
Move your mouse on the top edge of the r: 在閱讀器界面，將滑鼠游標移至上邊緣處，在彈出的選單欄中點擊新增書籤
Download failed,network problem or no ba: 下載失敗，網路出錯或者沒有找到備份
Disable screen blanking: 阻止電腦進入休眠模式
When Koodo is running, your computer won: Koodo運行時，電腦不會進入休眠模式
Import books as link: 以引用的方式導入圖書
Close main window while reading: 打開圖書時自動關閉主窗口
Get rid of window frame, make reader hid: 隱藏閱讀器邊框，使其混入Word，無法被發現，需要您提前設置好窗口的大小、位置和樣式
The imported books will not be copied to: 打開圖書時直接在原始路徑打開圖書，不會把圖書再復製到圖書庫中
Reader menu will not be triggered by hov: 閱讀器菜單不是進入特定區域就觸發，而是需要點擊相關區域才能觸發
Gesture and UI optimization for touch sc: 針對觸控屏進行了UI和手勢操作的優化
The book that you read from last time wi: 軟件啟動時，自動打開上次閱讀的圖書
All the folded content will be expanded: 自動展開圖書的多級目錄
Reader window will be maximized to fit t: 打開圖書時，窗口自動最大化
Open books in the main window: 直接在主窗口打開圖書
Book won't be opened in a separate windo: 圖書不會在一個單獨的窗口打開，而是直接在主窗口打開
Open book without adding it to library: 打開圖書但不添加到書庫
When opening books in the file manager w: 當您使用Koodo打開文件夾中的圖書時，圖書不會被添加到書庫中
Please turn off open books in the main w: 請關閉直接在主窗口打開圖書的選項
This action will delete all the notes, b: 此操作將刪除本書的所有筆記、書簽和摘要
Koodo Reader's web version are limited b: Koodo Reader的網頁版受瀏覽器限製，更強大的功能請下載桌面版
Shelf title can't be pure number: Shelf title can't be a number
This process is inreversible, and will c: This process is irreversible, and will completely overwrite your current library, make sure you know what you're doing before proceeding
Lemmatize words when looking up in a dic: Lemmatize words when looking up in a dictionary
To reduce the different forms of a word: To reduce the different forms of a word to one single form, for example, reducing builds, building or built to build, reducing cats to cat, reducing fastest to fast
Pre-cache books after import to increase: Pre-cache books after import to increase opening speed, Koodo will generate a pre-cache version of the original book and save it into your library
Don't use first page as PDF cover: Don't use first page as PDF cover
You may see this error when the book you: You may see this error when the book you're importing is not supported by Koodo Reader, try converting it with Calibre
Right click on any book and click Add to: Right click on any book and click Add to favorite to add it to your favorite books
Turn it on when you want Koodo to work w: Turn it on when you want Koodo to work with other third-party translation service, right clicking on the selected text will trigger popup again
When deleting books, they will be delete: When deleting books, they will be permanently deleted instead of being sent to the trash
Hide books already added to the shelf: Hide books already added to the shelf
Hide books which have been added to the: Hide books which have been added to the shelf, so they won't show up in home page
Delete book from shelf also deleting boo: Delete book from shelf also deleting book itself
When deleting book from shelf, the book: When deleting a book from the shelf, the book will be deleted as well
This action will permanently delete the: This action will permanently delete the selected books, together with their notes, bookmarks and digests
Use SSL, 1 for use, 0 for not use: Use SSL, 1 for use, 0 for not use
Thanks for using the developer version,: Thanks for using the developer version, leave a comment if you encounter any problems. Note that we can't reply to you from here. For faster and better support, please visit
You're not using the latest version of K: You're not using the latest version of Koodo Reader. Please update first
Your email(optional), We may contact you: Your email(optional), We may contact you for further investigation
